external_games.name: Train Simulator: BR GT3 Turbine Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: BR GT3 Turbine Loco Add-On
summary: One of the more unusual locomotives ever to be built, the GT3 Gas Turbine Prototype is nevertheless part of British railway history and is now available for Train Simulator from Victory Works.The GT3 was part of a programme for the development of gas turbine locomotives started in the late 1940s.
